dict.string: on alfred_script(ctrl) tell application "System Events" set frontmostApplication to name of the first process whose frontmost is true end tell tell application "Hermes" activate tell application "System Events" if ctrl is equal to "like" or ctrl is equal to "good" or ctrl is equal to "+" then tell application "System Events" to keystroke "l" using command down else if ctrl = "dislike" or ctrl = "bad" or ctrl = "-" then tell application "System Events" to keystroke "d" using command down else if ctrl = "skip" or ctrl = "next" or ctrl = "~" then tell application "System Events" to keystroke "e" using command down else if ctrl = "tired" or ctrl = "!" then tell application "System Events" to keystroke "t" using command down else if ctrl = "play" or ctrl = "pause" or ctrl = ">" or ctrl = "#" then tell application "System Events" to keystroke " " end if end tell end tell if not (ctrl = "activate" or ctrl = "show") then tell application frontmostApplication to activate end if end alfred_script
